channel.title: A way to undo reporting
channel.description: Reported wrong person by accident, clicked the report button above theirs, and you can't undo to click on the right person, would like to have that feature in case of said misclicks.

item.title: A way to undo reporting
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
reports are judged by humans… so yeah while you should try to avoid mistakes to make their jobs easier, if your description is good they are most certainly going to see the real offender when they look at the report, and almost certainly see what you were really talking about.

Read full topic

item.title: A way to undo reporting
item.dc:creator: PokemonKidRyan
item.description:
When reporting someone, you have to file out the reasons and type a description!
There’s plenty of time to just undo who you’re reporting, isn’t there
Unless you don’t realize for such a long time and submit everything too quickly.

When reporting always make sure you’re reporting the correct person.

Read full topic

item.title: A way to undo reporting
item.dc:creator: ZenSandWoman
item.description:
Reported wrong person by accident, clicked the report button above theirs, and you can’t undo to click on the right person, would like to have that feature in case of said misclicks.

Read full topic
